requirement_detail: Evidence of ties to home country
Visa interview at US embassy/consulate required
Proof of ability to pay tuition and expenses
Visa interview demonstrating intent to return
Proof of funds (£945+ in bank account for 28 days)
Accommodation details (booking or letter from host)
Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies (CAS) letter
Proof of tuition fees payment and living expenses
Proof of funds for stay (minimum $2000 CAD)
Job offer with approved Labour Market Impact Assessment
Valid passport valid for work permit validity
Letter of acceptance from Canadian school
Proof of financial support for studies
Proof of sufficient funds and return ticket
Confirmation of Enrolment (CoE) from Australian school
Hotel booking or tour operator confirmation
Proof of financial support from institution
Job offer from Japanese employer with visa sponsorship
Valid passport (validity for at least 6 months beyond stay)
Valid passport valid for 3+ months beyond trip
University degree or 5 years professional experience
Job offer with Certificate of Sponsorship
Proof of funds for post-study work
Valid passport valid for 3+ months beyond trip
Valid passport valid beyond stay period
Approved job offer from Malaysian company
Approval from Thai Department of Employment
Valid passport valid for 3+ months beyond trip
Valid passport with minimum 6 months validity
Proof of return tickets and accommodation
